TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Animals spawn in your territory when you are at war. [ICON_BULLET]Prevents your Animals and Beasts from getting Tame. [ICON_BULLET]All your opponents get -30% capture rate against Animals and Beasts [ICON_BULLET]Razing cities creates Forests and Ancient Forests around them.

[ICON_BULLET]All your opponents get -30% capture rate against Animals and Beasts [ICON_BULLET]Razing cities creates Forests and Ancient Forests around them.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Randomly creates new Forests in the world when acquired. [ICON_BULLET]All wild Animals and Beasts get Marksman promotion. [ICON_BULLET]All your opponents get -20% capture chance against Animals and Beasts.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Randomly creates new forests and ancient forests in the world when acquired.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Summoned animals gain Heroic attack I, Woodsman I and II[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Randomly creates new forests and ancient forests in the world when acquired
